mapper.select: SELECT tc.camera_code, tr.road_name FROM t_camera tc LEFT JOIN t_site ts ON tc.site_id = ts.site_id LEFT JOIN t_road_seg trs ON ts.site_id = trs.src_site_id LEFT JOIN t_road tr ON trs.road_id = tr.road_id WHERE tr.road_name is not null UNION ALL SELECT tc.camera_code, tr.road_name FROM t_camera tc LEFT JOIN t_site ts ON tc.site_id = ts.site_id LEFT JOIN t_road_seg trs ON ts.site_id = trs.dst_site_id LEFT JOIN t_road tr ON trs.road_id = tr.road_id WHERE tr.road_name is not null
